fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery / ATK % |<goblet>  Pyro DMG Bonus|<circlet>  CRIT Rate / CRIT DMG

fields.value: CRIT Rate / CRIT DMG|Elemental Mastery|ATK %|Energy Recharge

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Passion Overload
**2)** Elemental Burst: Fantastic Voyage
**3)** Normal Attack: Strike of Fortune

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
This build focuses on using Bennett's Elemental Skill to deal damage while his Elemental Burst is active.
Elemental Mastery should be ignored if he's in a Mono Pyro team.
Thundering Fury should only be used in Overload teams, it also increases the value of Elemental Mastery.
